meanings.def: to create or prepare something carefully, giving particular attention to the details
examples: formulate something to formulate a policy/theory/plan/proposal
The compost is specially formulated for pot plants.
formulate something to do something This new kitchen cleaner is formulated to cut through grease and dirt.
His ideas are always very carefully formulated.
products that are specially formulated for safe use on leather

meanings.def: to express your ideas in carefully chosen words
examples: She has lots of good ideas, but she has difficulty formulating them.
He struggled to formulate an answer.
